extendedInfo.description: Expose your babies to the world of colors!!!Our award-winning Panda Painting 1 can help your babies learn  colors through sight , sound & touch. The app is educational, enjoyable and practical. The most important feature of the Panda Painting 1 is to expand the limits of babiesâ imagination and trigger babiesâ creativity.Four age-appropriate themes with 28 cute and colorful illustrations and 11 big crayons, allow your babies to explore the world of colors, and make progress in the adventure of learning colors.In order to enhance babiesâ imagination and creativity, the app sets no rules and all these illustrations are just presented as frames. Babies can choose any colors they like to paint the magical picture they have in their mind. Taking advantage of the simple operation of iPad and iPhone, the Panda Painting 1 is simple enough for babies to explore drawing and colors. With just one figure, your babiesâ creativity can be improved drastically.The voice prompt invitations make babies know the name of each color in a convenient and funny way. We also add wonderful background music to the app. When babies are painting, the music can help them to calm down and promote their artistic thinking. Creativity and imagination are unleashed here!!!Download The Panda Painting 1 for your babies, and their artistic side will shine brightly.Features:You will be impressed by attractive designIntuitive control designed especially for childrenSave photos to your device photo libraryTouch & fill or paint with your fingers, whichever you like!Setup your children for age appropriate funVoice prompt invitations___________â¶design concepts:We focus on inspiration, not just learning.We focus on capacity-building, rather than a single cognition.We focus on entertaining, rather than spoon-feeding teaching.Take the baby bus, which is loaded with a happy childhood!___________â¶The series introduction:Baby Bus is the first brand in early childhood educational software (field of mobile Internet), which is developed specifically for preschoolers, and includes two series which are the Age(1-3) and the Age(3-6). The series of the Age(1-3) combines the main concepts of early childhood education for 1-3 year-old babies and covers the cognitive development, games, songs and other relevant categories. The applications of Age(1-3) are designed to train the babyâs cognition ability and hand-eye coordination skills.Tips: In the search bar, enter "BabyBus" or " sinyee", to find all of our products.___________â¶Welcome to contact us on:E-mail: ser@baby-bus.comwebsite: http://www.baby-bus.com

reviews.title: Good app, bad alphabet song
reviews.comment: My 4 year old loves this app is rus smooth and is very engaging, however the abc song is not what is taught in school and is confusing for a child learning the right way. Please fix the song so its sang the way its suppose to be. For now ill have to uninstall this app until that problem is fixed.
reviews.author: Tiffany Morton

reviews.title: Advertisement
reviews.comment: First advertisement that showed up after I installed this app for my CHILD was a NAKED WOMAN! I understand advertisements fund these apps but that was wrong! Those kinds of advertisements should not be on baby or Childers games at all!!!! Makes me sick!
